quote: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
author: Peggy Fleming

quote: I love Nautilus and stretching. The results are immediate, and that gives me the motivation to continue.
author: Donna Dixon

quote: The main thing is that it's nice to see these young people - 9 to 14 years old - take the opportunity to get more involved in their health and fitness. We need more kids to be more active.
author: Rafer Johnson

quote: I believe it's extremely important to include some other type of fitness activity in your training, so cross training will help you to avoid injury when you are dancing.
author: Laurieann Gibson

quote: My bottom is so big it's got its own gravitational field.
author: Carol Vorderman

quote: Regularity in the hours of rising and retiring, perseverance in exercise, adaptation of dress to the variations of climate, simple and nutritious aliment, and temperance in all things are necessary branches of the regimen of health.
author: Lord Chesterfield

quote: I'm healthy now. I probably wouldn't say I'm at my best fitness level and I haven't played that much lately, but I'm healthy and that's all that matters.
author: Mary Pierce

quote: Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Like most people I can be lazy, so it's nice to have a goal or deadline or reason to work out. I feel better when I get to exercise, or when I'm outdoors. I like to hike, swim and run, and I love to play soccer.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: I like exercise. I like a healthy body.
author: Erin Gray

quote: I feel if I'm healthy and happy, I look good. With a good mixture of fitness and healthy food I always feel great!
author: Candice Swanepoel

quote: The most important quality in a leader is that of being acknowledged as such. All leaders whose fitness is questioned are clearly lacking in force.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: In the British Special Air Service, combat fitness is all about running.
author: Bear Grylls

quote: Muscles come and go flab lasts.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: I've always believed fitness is an entry point to help you build that happier, healthier life. When your health is strong, you're capable of taking risks. You'll feel more confident to ask for the promotion. You'll have more energy to be a better mom. You'll feel more deserving of love.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: The only weights I lift are my dogs.
author: Olivia Newton-John

quote: The main thing is that it's nice to see these young people - 9 to 14 years old - take the opportunity to get more involved in their health and fitness. We need more kids to be more active.
author: Rafer Johnson

quote: Here's what I tell anybody and this is what I believe. The greatest gift we have is the gift of life. We understand that. That comes from our Creator. We're given a body. Now you may not like it, but you can maximize that body the best it can be maximized.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: For whatever reason, maybe it's because of my story, but people associate Livestrong with exercise and physical fitness, health and lifestyle choices like that.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very fast.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Personally, I need a high level of physical fitness in order to feel at ease.
author: Jurgen Klinsmann

quote: He who has health, has hope and he who has hope, has everything.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: There are similarities between business and sport, in the pressures involved and in the fitness aspect too.
author: Peter Shilton

quote: If I don't feel confident about my body, I'm not going to sit at home and feel sorry for myself and not do something about it. It's all about taking action and not being lazy. So you do the work, whether it's fitness or whatever. It's about getting up, motivating yourself and just doing it.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: I'm French, so I'm quite lazy about exercising, and I smoke. But I do love going for a run in the morning with my dog. That's all.
author: Eva Green

quote: I've published one book before, and now I'm writing a book of essays and stories about life in Tokyo. And I have one book coming out in May in Germany, about fitness.
author: Franka Potente

quote: Exercise is labor without weariness.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Fitness is a luxury when you are busy!
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: Happiness lies first of all in health.
author: George William Curtis

quote: If it weren't for the fact that the TV set and the refrigerator are so far apart, some of us wouldn't get any exercise at all.
author: Joey Adams

quote: I thought I did well for someone who has been out for 10 or 11 months. Then I was sub against Liverpool and tried to play for the guys and work on my fitness.
author: Paul Gascoigne

quote: I try and maintain a little bit of fitness, man.
author: Frank Bruno

quote: My bottom is so big it's got its own gravitational field.
author: Carol Vorderman

quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quote: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
author: Peggy Fleming

quote: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
author: Peggy Fleming

quote: I love Nautilus and stretching. The results are immediate, and that gives me the motivation to continue.
author: Donna Dixon

quote: Parentage is a very important profession, but no test of fitness for it is ever imposed in the interest of the children.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Clearly, society has a tremendous stake in insisting on a woman's natural fitness for the career of mother: the alternatives are all too expensive.
author: Ann Oakley

quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Here's what I tell anybody and this is what I believe. The greatest gift we have is the gift of life. We understand that. That comes from our Creator. We're given a body. Now you may not like it, but you can maximize that body the best it can be maximized.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: You gotta have a body.
author: Jayne Mansfield

quote: One of the things I've always enjoyed is moving around and staying fit. Physicality is such a big part of being an actor, but it's also about stillness and silence.
author: Joel Edgerton

quote: Exercise is the chief source of improvement in our faculties.
author: Hugh Blair

quote: My priority is to turn people - especially kids - on to sports and being active so they don't even have to think about it being good for their health. If people participate for the fun of it, and believe me - it is fun, then fitness programs will be much more successful.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: They both go together you can't be in front of the camera hosting a fitness television show in front of 75 million households and not have trained 6 days per week year round - in a bikini no less.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A drunkard in the gutter is just where he ought to be, according to the fitness and tendency of things. Nature has set upon him the process of decline and dissolution by which she removes things which have survived their usefulness.
author: William Graham Sumner

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: I do a one-hour workout called Drenched, a cardio-boxing fitness routine, Monday through Friday. There are usually between twenty-five and fifty people there - everyone from stay-at-home moms and professional martial artists to teenagers and seniors. They play great dance music. When I can, I take two classes back-to-back.
author: Carrie Ann Inaba

quote: He who has health, has hope and he who has hope, has everything.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Our children are obese, either have or being threatened by diabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and not socially adjusting properly to others because of a lack of fitness.
author: Richard Simmons

quote: As the proud father of two teens and past Chairman to the Presidents Council on Physical Fitness and Sports, I am committed to educating parents and especially young people on ways to live a long, healthy and active life.
author: Lee Haney

quote: I'm healthy now. I probably wouldn't say I'm at my best fitness level and I haven't played that much lately, but I'm healthy and that's all that matters.
author: Mary Pierce

quote: I suffer panic attacks which has made me really conscious about my fitness and I have become addicted to jogging. It might sound odd but a lot of good has come out of it. My fans send letters saying they have taken up jogging because I do it.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: With both kids, I started working out again at 16 days postpartum, but I treated myself with kindness, doing mild workouts, because my fitness level was lower.
author: Gabrielle Reece

quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quote: I believe it's extremely important to include some other type of fitness activity in your training, so cross training will help you to avoid injury when you are dancing.
author: Laurieann Gibson

quote: It's been a long road back to health and fitness for me. I am just glad to have been given the opportunity to do what I love most.
author: Jonah Lomu

quote: A life coach does for the rest of your life what a personal trainer does for your health and fitness.
author: Elaine MacDonald

quote: I just want to do what I do best, and that's fight. I love it.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
author: Barbara de Angelis

quote: I often try to tell kids to think about all the people who love you, don't cry over the one person who doesn't.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: I can't imagine anything more worthwhile than doing what I most love. And they pay me for it.
author: Edgar Winter

quote: Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: You either love or you hate. You live in the middle, you get nothing.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: The reason men oppose progress is not that they hate progress, but that they love inertia.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Many people mistake our work for our vocation. Our vocation is the love of Jesus.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I am certainly not an authority on love because there are no authorities on love, just those who've had luck with it and those who haven't.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: We perceive when love begins and when it declines by our embarrassment when alone together.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Love is anterior to life, posterior to death, initial of creation, and the exponent of breath.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: I do all the evil I can before I learn to shun it? Is it not enough to know the evil to shun it? If not, we should be sincere enough to admit that we love evil too well to give it up.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: It is very easy to love alone.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: Love is the most important thing in the world. Hate, we should remove from the dictionary.
author: John Wooden

quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
author: John Keats

quote: Love is a driver, bitter and fierce if you fight and resist him, Easy-going enough once you acknowledge his power.
author: Ovid

quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: If I think more about death than some other people, it is probably because I love life more than they do.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: If so many men, so many minds, certainly so many hearts, so many kinds of love.
author: Tolstoy, Leo

quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: My trust in a higher power that wants me to survive and have love in my life, is what keeps me moving forward.
author: Kenny Loggins

quote: Love is the extra effort we make in our dealings with those whom we do not like and once you understand that, you understand all. This idea that love overtakes you is nonsense. This is but a polite manifestation of sex. To love another you have to undertake some fragment of their destiny.
author: Crisp, Quentin

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: First and last, what is demanded of genius is love of truth.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: It's good for everyone to understand that they are to love their enemies, simply because your enemies show you things about yourself you need to change. So in actuality enemies are friends in reverse.
author: Gary Busey

quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: I have a very strong feeling that the opposite of love is not hate - it's apathy. It's not giving a damn.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
author: Erich Segal

quote: In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
author: David Grayson

quote: The sadness of the women's movement is that they don't allow the necessity of love. See, I don't personally trust any revolution where love is not allowed.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is energy of life.
author: Browning, Robert

quote: I love the attention but I don't like too much of it.
author: Eminem

quote: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned.
author: William Congreve

quote: The truth is I love being alive. And I love feeling free. So if I can't have those things then I feel like a caged animal and I'd rather not be in a cage. I'd rather be dead. And it's real simple. And I think it's not that uncommon.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Love is not consolation. It is light.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love doesn't cause pain, people do.
author: Unknown

quote: Love to faults is always blind, always is to joy inclined. Lawless, winged, and unconfined, and breaks all chains from every mind.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: To fall in love is easy, even to remain in it is not difficult our human loneliness is cause enough. But it is a hard quest worth making to find a comrade through whose steady presence one becomes steadily the person one desires to be.
author: Anna Louise Strong

quote: I understand now that the vulnerability I've always felt is the greatest strength a person can have. You can't experience life without feeling life. What I've learned is that being vulnerable to somebody you love is not a weakness, it's a strength.
author: Elisabeth Shue

quote: A man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I met in the street a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, his cloak was out at the elbows, the water passed through his shoes, - and the stars through his soul.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Never make your home in a place. Make a home for yourself inside your own head. You'll find what you need to furnish it - memory, friends you can trust, love of learning, and other such things. That way it will go with you wherever you journey.
author: Tad Williams

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
author: Julius Caesar

quote: I think careful cooking is love, don't you? The loveliest thing you can cook for someone who's close to you is about as nice a valentine as you can give.
author: Julia Child

quote: I love you more than my own skin.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: The cure for all the ills and wrongs, the cares, the sorrows, and the crimes of humanity, all lie in the one word 'love'. It is the divine vitality that everywhere produces and restores life.
author: Lydia M. Child

quote: Death is a challenge. It tells us not to waste time... It tells us to tell each other right now that we love each other.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: If the Great Way perishes there will morality and duty. When cleverness and knowledge arise great lies will flourish. When relatives fall out with one another there will be filial duty and love. When states are in confusion there will be faithful servants.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Depression is when you have lots of love, but no one's taking.
author: Doug Coupland

quote: It has always seemed strange to me... the things we admire in men, kindness and generosity, openness, honesty, understanding and feeling, are the concomitants of failure in our system. And those traits we detest, sharpness, greed, acquisitiveness, meanness, egotism and self-interest, are the traits of success. And while men admire the quality of the first they love the produce of the second.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Start living now. Stop saving the good china for that special occasion. Stop withholding your love until that special person materializes. Every day you are alive is a special occasion. Every minute, every breath, is a gift from God.
author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quote: Act happy, feel happy, be happy, without a reason in the world. Then you can love, and do what you will.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: What love we've given, we'll have forever. What love we fail to give, will be lost for all eternity.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Those who have the strength and the love to sit with a dying patient in the silence that goes beyond words will know that this moment is neither frightening nor painful, but a peaceful cessation of the functioning of the body.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours if they don't they never were.
author: Richard Bach

quote: I have been astonished that men could die martyrs for religion - I have shuddered at it. I shudder no more - I could be martyred for my religion - Love is my religion - I could die for that.
author: John Keats

quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: For one human being to love another that is perhaps the most difficult of all our tasks, the ultimate, the last test and proof, the work for which all other work is but preparation.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: No woman ever hates a man for being in love with her, but many a woman hate a man for being a friend to her.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: You either love or you hate. You live in the middle, you get nothing.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: It is cruel, you know, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.
author: Benjamin Britten

quote: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Love begets love. This torment is my joy.
author: Theodore Roethke

quote: All women have a perception much more developed than men. So all women somehow, being repressed for so many millennia, they ended up by developing this sixth sense and contemplation and love. And this is something that we have a hard time to accept as part of our society.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: For love would be love of the wrong thing there is yet faith, But the faith and the love and the hope are all in the waiting.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love conquers all things except poverty and toothache.
author: Mae West

quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I love to put on lotion. Sometimes I'll watch TV and go into a lotion trance for an hour. I try to find brands that don't taste bad in case anyone wants to taste me.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I know you've heard it a thousand times before. But it's true - hard work pays off. If you want to be good, you have to practice, practice, practice. If you don't love something, then don't do it.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
author: Donne, John

quote: This is the America that I love. This is a great people. We can do anything. We can achieve anything. We've got a government that has gotten in the way of the American people. We're going to change that in November.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Everyone can relate to love, hurt, pain, learning how to forgive, needing to get over, needing the power of God in their life.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: Music is what I breath, what I love to do. It keeps me alive.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
author: Princess Diana

quote: No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Men love to wonder, and that is the seed of science.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love is the most important thing in the world. Hate, we should remove from the dictionary.
author: John Wooden

quote: Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: Not necessity, not desire - no, the love of power is the demon of men. Let them have everything - health, food, a place to live, entertainment - they are and remain unhappy and low-spirited: for the demon waits and waits and will be satisfied.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Your home should be your home. People shouldn't be allowed to use whatever crazy lenses they use to catch you waking up in the morning.
author: Sarah Chalke

quote: The reporting I did was mostly entertainment or lifestyle. I took a very different approach than most reporters. I approached it more casually than you would think a reporter would. Now I'm a morning radio personality, and radio is really casual.
author: Eleanor Mondale

quote: I got a call this morning, and it was from Nancy Kerrigan, wishing me luck. She wished me luck and sent me all her good wishes.
author: Michelle Kwan

quote: I used to spend every morning in detention at my old school.
author: Jake Lloyd

quote: Like a morning dream, life becomes more and more bright the longer we live, and the reason of everything appears more clear. What has puzzled us before seems less mysterious, and the crooked paths look straighter as we approach the end.
author: Jean Paul

quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: I never thought in a million years I'd be that healthy girl who wakes up every morning to exercise. After being called 'cherubic and chubby,' I'm rocking a bikini!
author: Kelly Osbourne

quote: My days, if they start in the morning with a cuddle from my son, are just so much more glorious than they were prior to that.
author: Russell Crowe

quote: My principal motivation is supporting my family, which is not a bad reason for getting up in the morning. That's always been my motivation - to take care of the people who rely on me.
author: Tony Parsons

quote: Cinema in India is like brushing your teeth in the morning. You can't escape it.
author: Shahrukh Khan

quote: There's also a sense of freedom. I was so obsessed by this problem that I was thinking about it all the time - when I woke up in the morning, when I went to sleep at night, and that went on for eight years.
author: Andrew Wiles

quote: I am not a morning person.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: Bill Bennett really became an idol for me. I listened to him every morning from 6 to 9 for, oh, years.
author: Jonathan Krohn

quote: In New York, I like it when you can get bagels at 3 in the morning.
author: Shepard Smith

quote: I looked at films as a career from necessity but all I have really wanted is my home and children. The two things just do not work out together when one has to leave home at 5.30 am in the morning to go to the studio.
author: Dinah Sheridan

quote: What is different is I am giving the kids a chance to train every day. Not only once a day, but sometimes when they do not have school, we will try to do something in the morning too.
author: Thomas Dooley

quote: O sweet, delusive Noon, Which the morning climbs to find, O moment sped too soon, And morning left behind.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: If I'm coming in at 4:00 in the morning and my kids have been in bed since 8:00, 9:00, that's not setting a good example. The responsibility that I have kids inside my household has made me realize now that I have to be an example.
author: Gary Sheffield

quote: There is only one thing that a man really wants to do, all his life and that is, to find his way to his God, his Morning Star, salute his fellow man, and enjoy the woman who has come the long way with him.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: Get up tomorrow early in the morning, and earlier than you did today, and do the best that you can. Always stay near me, for tomorrow I will have much to do and more than I ever had, and tomorrow blood will leave my body above the breast.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: I'm always thinking about creating. My future starts when I wake up every morning... Every day I find something creative to do with my life.
author: Miles Davis

quote: Early on the next morning we reached Kansas, about five hundred miles from the mouth of the Missouri.
author: Francis Parkman

quote: The present moment is nice but it does not last. Living in it is like waiting in a junction town for the morning limited; the junction may be interesting but some day you will have to leave it and you do not know where the limited will take you.
author: Bruce Catton

quote: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
author: Tecumseh

quote: It really depends, but, generally speaking, just because of the mechanics of it, voice-over is easier because there is no hair, no makeup, no wardrobe, no fittings, no line memorizing. You don't have to be woken up in Russia at 6 in the morning and go film a scene. It's just easier on the body, the family life to do voice-overs.
author: Kathy Najimy

quote: I had someone call me this morning telling me they had somebody who would only work a certain number of hours a week because if they worked too many hours a week then they couldn't get their government assistance. And that person has multiple cell phones, and gets them new every month with new minutes.
author: Timothy Griffin

quote: Art is why I get up in the morning but my definition ends there. You know I don't think it's fair that I'm living for something I can't even define.
author: Ani DiFranco

quote: My wife gets pampered pretty well. She's had me trained since she was pregnant, when I started making her oatmeal with fresh berries every morning.
author: Michael Weatherly

quote: I always like to start my morning with a good amount of fruit. I really like pineapple, particularly because of the enzymes that it has. Sometimes I have oatmeal. But if I'm feeling like I really want to be watching my weight more, then I definitely do a protein, like an omelet, scrambled eggs or some smoked salmon.
author: Cynthia Nixon

quote: I didn't know that I could do a talk show. I didn't know that we could bring variety to daytime. I didn't know that people wanted to see singing, and dancing and comedy in the morning.
author: Wayne Brady

quote: I have got up at truly deplorable hours in the morning to confront Vancouver's Jack Webster on television because I have been told that is the place to get exposure for ideas.
author: Barbara Amiel

quote: I recently took up ice sculpting. Last night I made an ice cube. This morning I made 12, I was prolific.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Secretary of State Colin Powell, thank you so much, as always, for joining us this morning.
author: Hannah Storm

quote: Your body tells you what it needs, and if you sleep past your alarm on a Saturday morning, it's probably because you need the sleep.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: The repose of sleep refreshes only the body. It rarely sets the soul at rest. The repose of the night does not belong to us. It is not the possession of our being. Sleep opens within us an inn for phantoms. In the morning we must sweep out the shadows.
author: Gaston Bachelard

quote: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Always get married in the morning. That way if it doesn't work out, you haven't wasted the whole day.
author: Mickey Rooney

quote: I like to be busy and I like to have places to go in the morning, when I get up.
author: Sean Hayes

quote: My formula for living is quite simple. I get up in the morning and I go to bed at night. In between, I occupy myself as best I can.
author: Cary Grant

quote: So far as I know, anything worth hearing is not usually uttered at seven o'clock in the morning and if it is, it will generally be repeated at a more reasonable hour for a larger and more wakeful audience.

quote: In New York, I like it when you can get bagels at 3 in the morning.
author: Shepard Smith

quote: I mean, if you have to wake up in the morning to be validated by the editorial page of the New York Times, you got a pretty sorry existence.

quote: I trust, that your readers will not construe my words to mean, that I would not have gone to a 3 o'clock in the morning session, for the sake of defeating the Nebraska bill.

quote: Pharmaceutical companies are enjoying unprecedented profits and access with this Administration. Yet the Republicans' prescription drug plan for seniors has been a colossal failure, and over 43 million Americans wake up every morning without health insurance.

quote: The thing I love most about going on vacation is that I get to leave behind any kind of schedule. My entire life is scheduled from morning to night, and when I'm on vacation, there is no schedule.

quote: This morning's scene is good and fine, Long rain has not harmed the land.
author: Du Fu

quote: I wake up every morning singing 'The Star-Spangled Banner.'
author: Terry McAuliffe

quote: I'm pretty much a 9-to-5 kind of guy. I usually get to work about 8 in the morning, and I work until 4 or 5, and sometimes I work on Saturday and Sunday mornings. Pretty much I keep the same hours as an accountant or clerk or whatever.

quote: First of all, let me say, 1:15 in the morning, for 20,000 people to still be here, I wasn't the winner, tennis was. That's awesome. I don't know if I've ever felt so good here before.

quote: Our systems are all go. At 9:30 Monday morning trading will resume on both markets, and the message will be given to criminals who foisted this on America that they lost.
author: Richard Grasso

quote: Oh, I have this feud going with the L.A. Unified School District, because I keep getting these phone calls saying my daughter keeps missing classes, I mean, at all hours of the night, I had like, two calls this morning and I keep calling saying I haven't got a daughter!

quote: It doesn't much signify whom one marries, for one is sure to find next morning that it was someone else.

quote: In this respect early youth is exactly like old age it is a time of waiting for a big trip to an unknown destination. The chief difference is that youth waits for the morning limited and age waits for the night train.

quote: I can't find my car keys in the morning. Trying to get out of my house is a nightmare. 'Where's my wallet? Where are my keys? I have to go find a missing person.'
author: Anthony LaPaglia

quote: When I wrote the song, I had the sea near Bombay in mind. We stayed at a hotel by the sea, and the fishermen come up at five in the morning and they were all chanting. And we went on the beach and we got chased by a mad dog - big as a donkey.

quote: On 'Morning Joe' I can say what I think, be my sometimes unorthodox self, have fun, yet be serious as well.

quote: Well, he doesn't make me laugh. I think I've got a fair sense of humour but I can't really see it in him. I've listened to his show on the radio on a Saturday morning, and that's a load of mince as well.

quote: Cinema in India is like brushing your teeth in the morning. You can't escape it.

quote: Throughout my 20s I spent a lot of time just playing and not really working, but fortunately for me I continued to get just enough work, and have a reason to wake up in the morning. I really empathize with some of my peers who had success in the early years then it dries up, and so there's no reason to get up in the morning.

quote: Above all, this country is our own. Nobody has to get up in the morning and worry what his neighbors think of him. Being a Jew is no problem here.

quote: I always like to start my morning with a good amount of fruit. I really like pineapple, particularly because of the enzymes that it has. Sometimes I have oatmeal. But if I'm feeling like I really want to be watching my weight more, then I definitely do a protein, like an omelet, scrambled eggs or some smoked salmon.

quote: It was so quiet that morning in Paris that the heels of my two companions and myself were loud on the deserted pavements. It was a city of shuttered shops, and barred windows, and deserted avenues.

quote: I'm set to have my best year ever: I'm hiring some acts and there will be a show in the morning, in the afternoon and in the evening. I'm going to use my theater to its fullest potential.

quote: I love to be in my bathroom with my candles lit, morning, noon and night. I like taking hot baths and hot showers, using my body scrubs and lotions.

quote: It was one of those evenings when men feel that truth, goodness and beauty are one. In the morning, when they commit their discovery to paper, when others read it written there, it looks wholly ridiculous.

quote: My wife gets pampered pretty well. She's had me trained since she was pregnant, when I started making her oatmeal with fresh berries every morning.

quote: That's the biggest part of doing comics: You have to create stuff that makes you want to get out of bed every morning and get to work.

quote: I love to read. I love to stretch. In the morning, I get up, and if I'm not in a hurry, I will lie on the floor on a rug, look through some books and magazines, and maybe listen to music and try to do stretching exercises to tune up.

quote: I get up every morning and it's going to be a great day. You never know when it's going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.

quote: It was one of those evenings when men feel that truth, goodness and beauty are one. In the morning, when they commit their discovery to paper, when others read it written there, it looks wholly ridiculous.

quote: Early morning cheerfulness can be extremely obnoxious.

quote: It was a splendid summer morning and it seemed as if nothing could go wrong.

quote: In the morning a man walks with his whole body in the evening, only with his legs.

quote: The brain is a wonderful organ it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.

quote: In this respect early youth is exactly like old age it is a time of waiting for a big trip to an unknown destination. The chief difference is that youth waits for the morning limited and age waits for the night train.

quote: This morning when I put on my underwear I could hear the fruit-of-the-loom guys laughing at me.

quote: It was one of those evenings when men feel that truth, goodness and beauty are one. In the morning, when they commit their discovery to paper, when others read it written there, it looks wholly ridiculous.

quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.

quote: Ambition is not a vice of little people.

quote: To climb steep hills requires slow pace at first.

quote: The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall.

quote: There is only one success ... to be able to spend your life in your own way, and not to give others absurd maddening claims upon it.

quote: Mighty rivers can easily be leaped at their source.

quote: My mom was an actress in the local Seattle theater doing experimental plays.

quote: I used to do skits for my mom... and I was always entertaining as a kid.

quote: I spend as much time with my kids as any mom who stays home. I only work during the hours they're at school, but there is always the sense of trying to catch up with all their stuff and not only organize my work life but also their school lives.

quote: I am blessed to have Mom and Dad.
author: Kevin Eubanks

quote: It is a sad commentary of our times when our young must seek advice and counsel from 'Dear Abby' instead of going to Mom and Dad.

quote: I think there's a time to work, and everyone has to kind of adjust. And then there's a time to relax, and be the mom or take the kids on vacation when you need to wind down. So it's a matter of planning, and being able to map out your year or your week or let's start with the day. It is just being multi-tasking and being available.

quote: My mother and my grandmother are pioneers of Mexican cuisine in this country, so I grew up in the kitchen. My mom, Zarela Martinez, was by far my biggest influence and inspiration - and toughest critic.
author: Aaron Sanchez

quote: My mom enlisted in the U.S. Navy in World War II, and my parents actually bought our home thanks to the loan she got through the GI Bill.
author: Thomas Friedman

quote: If I have any talent at all it's from God, and my mom, who was on Capitol Records also.

quote: I was a big fan of 'The Smurfs' growing up, even though by default - my mom used to force me to watch because she was a 'Smurfs' fan.

quote: I was born and raised in East Los Angeles by a single mom who had three biological kids and adopted four more. I never met my dad.
author: will.i.am

quote: OK, so my parents were married in 1955 and my mom knew my dad was gay and my dad knew he was gay and so I was, like, 'Why in the heck did you get married?' Like, what was going on? What was that time? It's like this crazy paradox that my whole life is based on, or my family's based on. So I spent a lot of time trying to understand '55.
author: Mike Mills

quote: I showed my mom the movie then I told her the movie got bought and that it was gonna be shown in theatres and be on video. Everyone was really psyched about it. Everyone in my little town of hounds started to call me movie star.

quote: My mom is the backbone not just of my family but of many families.

quote: I would forgive my mom, but she's going to have to admit she did some things that were wrong.

quote: I am sure that if the mothers of various nations could meet, there would be no more wars.

quote: My parents, especially my mother, were no influence on me whatsoever.

quote: Because sorry to say, women run the house. They run the family. They hold things up. I mean, it's like you don't ever see your mom get sick because she handles everything. And it's kind of amazing I think to show people just how strong women are.

quote: My mom took me to see Carnal Knowledge and The Wild Bunch and all these kind of movies when I was a kid.

quote: When I was a kid, my mom used to run the vacuum cleaner, and the noise would bother me so much that I would run into the woods to calm down. I feel like that vacuum cleaner has been on since I moved to New York City.

quote: If you just stay away from junk, and stick with what your mom taught you, you're eating pretty healthy.

quote: I stand fearlessly for small dogs, the American Flag, motherhood and the Bible. That's why people love me.

quote: My mother taught me about the power of inspiration and courage, and she did it with a strength and a passion that I wish could be bottled.

quote: As a mom I know that raising children is the hardest job there is.

quote: I've been drawing my whole life. My mom says my sister and I were drawing by age 1. Animation seems a real, natural extension of drawing as a way of telling a story visually.

quote: My mom came from such humble beginnings and especially my dad as well. He didn't go to university.

quote: Isn't it so weird the day you wake up and you're just going with the flow? And you just suddenly are a mom.

quote: My mom, she's from Ireland, coached tennis in Nigeria when she was a missionary and turned me on to it when I was young.

quote: My dad sold encyclopedias and my mom worked in a factory office.

quote: Being a mom is hard, I think a lot of working moms feel that way.

quote: I have so much respect for my mom and all the women across the world.

quote: I'm looking forward to being a mom and a wife and a business owner.

quote: Studies show that children best flourish when one mom and one dad are there to raise them.

quote: My mom was a saint. She taught me to be terminally nice.

quote: I'm a sappy mom now. I didn't think I would be. I thought I'd be a cool mom who keeps everything in perspective.

quote: The one thing my mom will let me get is a nice shoe sometimes.
author: Chloe Moretz

quote: I love Westerns and I remember as a kid climbing up on the couch and make it into a saddle and shoot guns and fall off. I would lay there after my death and my mom would tell me to eat lunch and I'd say, 'I'm still dead, Mom!' I was Method, even then.
author: Creed Bratton

quote: It's her first grandchild, so she's really, really, really excited. I guess my mom is a little more stressed out than me.
author: Brandy Norwood

quote: My mom would give me a piece to play, but I wouldn't do any theory because when it came time to do it I would sneak back upstairs and watch TV. So, I had these kind of nonchalant lessons for years, then it just started soaking in.
author: Vanessa Carlton

quote: I'm going to let people know that it's cool to have a child and be young and still be a good mom. It's really tough, but I'm doing it.
author: Brandy Norwood

quote: Something my mom taught me when I was little is that everything happens for a reason.
author: Shawn Johnson

quote: My mom was very strict when I was growing up. I could not talk to boys until I was 18. I had to study and work hard.
author: Coco Lee

quote: Mothers don't let your daughters grow up to be models unless you're present.
author: Janice Dickinson

quote: The rule with my mom was that the only way that I could be an actress when I was young was that I continued to go to public school and get straight A's in all my classes.
author: Sara Paxton

quote: I just go about my life. I'm a mom, I drive an SUV, I go to the grocery store every day. I'm definitely not a celebrity. I always say that I'm a celebrity-adjacent.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: A company that pays attention to the family unit is a successful company. We don't isolate the family. We don't make rides that say, 'Hey mom, dad, you go sit on the bench.'
author: Michael Eisner

quote: I'm a lioness. I have four cubs. I'm a mom. I want to take care of my kids and protect them.
author: Heidi Klum

quote: My mom taught me how to make grilled chicken, and I bake, too.
author: Rico Rodriguez

quote: I'm proud of what I look like. I'm proud that I look like my mom.
author: Lisa Guerrero

quote: When I was seven, I asked my mom if I could be on TV, and she said if I really wanted to, I could. I got an agent and booked my first audition.
author: Natasha Calis

quote: My mom just understands about stuff. We have a really good trust, and she knows I can take care of myself.
author: Balthazar Getty

quote: I look up to my mom. She's a beautiful woman.
author: Leighton Meester

quote: My parents were working class folks. My dad was a bartender for most of his life, my mom was a maid and a cashier and a stock clerk at WalMart. We were not people of financial means in terms of significant financial means. I always told them, 'I didn't always have what I wanted. I always had what I needed.' My parents always provided that.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: My mom raised us three boys by herself on welfare. It's not worse than anybody else's life.
author: Jeffrey Donovan

quote: I basically became a cheerleader because I had a very strict mom. That was my way of being a bad girl.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: I pretty much borrow my entire beauty regime from my mom.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I had such a great mom and I know that I'd never be that mom. I wouldn't want to bring a child into this world unless I could be.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: My mom was always pretty supportive. She saw me do plays and she'd always act out the parts I did. My aunt, who played a big part in my life, was a little bit more reserved, because if they don't see you on TV every week they think you must be starving.
author: Angela Bassett

quote: Being a singer is all about me. About ego. Being a mom is all about being selfless - two different worlds.
author: Gwen Stefani

quote: I'm a mom - I'm lucky if I get to shower in the morning. Luckily, nail polish stays on my toes. I've been so bad on the upkeep, though.
author: Idina Menzel

quote: My mom passed away at 41 from diabetes. And I'm 42, thank you. I didn't want to that to my son. So any time I was at the gym, that thing that helped me do that last squat was my son calling some other woman mommy. And that would just give me that extra oomph to do that last squat. I want to be around for him.
author: Sherri Shepherd

quote: New Year’s Day is every man’s birthday.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The best is yet to come.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: New year, new feels, new chances. Same dreams, fresh starts.
author: Unknown

quote: This is a new year. A new beginning. And things will change.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: And now we welcome the new year, full of things that have never been.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: A year from now, you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A new year is a chance to start fresh, to embrace the unknown, and to make new memories.
author: Unknown

quote: Let us celebrate the New Year, embrace the joy, and make this year even better.
author: Unknown

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: New Year’s is a time to celebrate new beginnings, new opportunities, and new adventures.
author: Unknown

quote: New Year’s Day is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.
author: Unknown

quote: A new year means a new start, a new chance to fulfill your dreams and make a difference.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: For last year’s words belong to last year’s language. And next year’s words await another voice.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Tomorrow, is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.
author: Brad Paisley

quote: New Year, new beginnings. Let’s make this year the best yet.
author: Unknown

quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: This year, be strong, be courageous, and follow your dreams.
author: Unknown

quote: A new year brings new hope, new opportunities, and new challenges.
author: Unknown

quote: The magic in new beginnings is truly the most powerful of them all.
author: Josiyah Martin

quote: New Year’s Eve is the only time I ever feel like a part of the world.
author: William C. Durant

quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning’s end.
author: Seneca

quote: The future depends on what we do in the present.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Let us make this year the year we make our dreams come true.
author: Unknown

quote: New Year is the perfect time to start something new, to begin again and to make it amazing.
author: Unknown

quote: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves.
author: Unknown
